componentInstanceProperties.value: Project Objectives

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Summarize the Overall Objectives of the Project

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Explain How the Proposed Work is Consistent with or Complementary to DOE / PNNL Missions.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Will the Proposed Work Adversely Impact PNNL's Execution of DOE-Assigned Projects?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Explain how the Proposed Work Will Not Place PNNL in Direct Competition with the Domestic or Private Sector

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Will the Proposed Work Create a Detrimental Future Burden of DOE Resources?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Is This Proposal in Response to a Broad Agency Announcement or Similar Solicitation? (if yes, please explain)

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Will the work involve Construction or Facility Modifications? (May provide additional details as needed)

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Will the work involve Human or Animal Subjects? (May provide details as needed)

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Will the work be performed outside of the US? (May prove additional details as needed)

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Will the Work Involve the Procurement of Equipment and/or Materials?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Are there any Special ES&H Compliance Actions Required During the Course of the Project?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Does the Work Have Planned Use of Subcontractors?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: ALLOCATION OF PATENT RIGHTS UNDER NON-FEDERAL WORK FOR OTHERS

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please Note that if you change the PNSO Tech Rep or PNSO Contracting Officer after submitting to Approvals, you must terminate the current Approval and Re-Submit!
